top.mainTitle: The digital platform for a strong diagnostic network
top.subTitle: Join to find and offer resources for more SARS-CoV-2 tests

details.title: How LabHive works
details.text: Increasing test capacity is crucial in the fight against SARS-CoV-2, but many places lack reagents, equipment and personnel. LabHive facilitates efficient access to resources for diagnostic laboratories.

diagnosticCenters.subtitle: Search for resources
diagnosticCenters.title: Diagnostic laboratories
diagnosticCenters.text: Search our curated data base for devices, materials, and expertise offered by other institutes or offer your own resources or advice. Qualified volunteers can be filtered by skills and contacted to assist with testing.

researchLabs.subtitle: Offer available resources
researchLabs.title: Research laboratories
researchLabs.text: List available resources such as devices, materials, and expertise in our database. Diagnostic laboratories can use the search tool to find resources and contact the offering institutions.

volunteers.subtitle: Help with your skills
volunteers.title: Qualified volunteers
volunteers.text: Offer your skills to verified diagnostic laboratories, whether as scientist or technical assistant. This allows diagnostic laboratories to find and contact you if necessary.

coverage.referenceRKI: Daily situation report about COVID-19 by the RKI, {date}
coverage.subTitle: Increasing test capacity is crucial in the fight against SARS-CoV-2, but many places lack reagents, materials, equipment and personnel. Our platform promotes the development of a strong diagnostic network and facilitates efficient access to resources for diagnostic laboratories. Spread the test, beat the virus!
coverage.title: Test capacity and support

press.title: More information about LabHive
press.subtitle: Short summary, press release and picture material

passwordStrength.1Password: Too short, please also add numbers and special characters
passwordStrength.2Password: Please also add numbers and special characters
passwordStrength.3Password: Sufficiently secure, with more characters your password will become even more secure

contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.not_available: Contact details are only available to registered diagnostic or research laboratories users.

searchDetails.notAvailableAnymore_warning:
This action omits the person from search results. We will then send them an e-mail informing them that the option has been set for their profile.

Within 3 days they can confirm or dispute this. If no action is taken, after this time, the profile will no longer be found in the search.

Thank you very much for your help!

Do you want to proceed?

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.successMessage: If the e-mail address is registered, you will receive an e-mail from us shortly.

login.title: Login
login.emptyField: Please fill in the fields and try again!

revokeConsent.mail: Receive no updates via email anymore.
revokeConsent.dataProcessing: Sending my personal data to registered diagnostic and research laboratories.
revokeConsent.loginRequired: Please log in and open the link again.
revokeConsent.title: Revoke consent

offer.title: Current Offers
offer.subTitle: If you can offer resources, you can enter them here. You can always change this later in your profile. Click on “Next” below if you do not have anything to share at present.
offer.adviceDescription: More detailed information on the areas in which you can offer help.
offer.equipmentDescription: More detailed information about the devices/materials you can offer. Link to offered item on manufacturer website, order no, quantity, description, etc.

request.title: Current Requests
request.subTitle: If you need resources, you can list them here. You can always change this later in your profile. Click on “Next” below if currently you do not need anything. You will find qualified volunteers using the search feature.
request.adviceDescription: More detailed information about the areas in which you need help.
request.equipmentDescription: More detailed information about the devices/materials required. Link to requested item on manufacturer website, order no, quantity, description, etc.

delete.confirmation: Do you really want to delete your profile?

descriptions.dCenter: Active diagnostic laboratories that currently offer SARS-CoV-2 tests including sample processing and analysis
descriptions.qVolunteers: Scientific staff or technical assistants with training and experience in the use of laboratory equipment, sample preparation or data analysis
descriptions.rLab: Academic or industrial research laboratories with access to reagents, materials, devices, or suitable laboratory space (BSL-2/3)

registration.title: Register
registration.subtitle: Please register to access all functionalities of LabHive. In case of questions or if you experience other problems, please contact us at info@labhive.de.
registration.labActivation: Since you registered as diagnostic or research laboratory, we verify your account manually. This takes some time, but you will receive an email, when it is done.
registration.confirmationMail: We have sent a link to confirm the registration to {mail}. Please click on this link to activate your account.
registration.progressResetWarning: All data will be deleted. Do you want to continue anyway?

consent.dataProcessingInformation:
By finishing the registration your data will be processed by LabHive. Your specified contact information is only visible for registered and internally verified research and diagnostic laboratories.

Registered volunteers have no possibility to respond to requests from diagnostic laboratories to prevent an increased e-mail flow. As a diagnostic laboratory you can however find volunteers through the search function, view their contact data and contact them.

Further information can be found in our privacy policy.
consent.title: Optional Consents
consent.mail:
LabHive may occasionally send me e-mail notifications about updates and new features of the website.

If you disagree, you will not receive any e-mail notifications from us.
consent.volunteerDisclaimer: Whether you are allowed to work as a volunteer in a diagnostic laboratory or whether you are released from work, you must clarify this with your employer on your own responsibility. If you are requested to work in a diagnostic laboratory, you, your employer and the diagnostic laboratory concerned are responsible for labour law. LabHive does not take any responsibility for this.
consent.search:
LabHive can share my data with registered and verified diagnostic- and research laboratories, in the context of the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic.

If you disagree, the use of our platform is limited, which means that you as a volunteer cannot be found via the search function. There is no possibility for volunteers to contact a registered and verified diagnostic laboratory.

You will find further information in our privacy policy.

contact.title: Affiliation & Contact
contact.subTitle: Please enter your contact details. We need this data to be able to verify you. We only share personal data such as name, e-mail address and telephone number with other verified diagnostic and research laboratories.
contact.subTitle_volunteer: Please provide your contact details and availability. We share sensitive information such as your name, e-mail address and phone number only with verified diagnostic- and research laboratories.
contact.available: Yes, I am currently available for helping out.
contact.not_available: No, I am currently not available for helping out.

loginInformation.title: Login Information
loginInformation.subTitle: Please enter your e-mail address and set a password.

qualification.title: Qualification
qualification.subTitle: Please state your qualification(s). Select all that apply.

skills.description: Further information on experience levels, additional skills, availability, etc. This description is publicly available.
skills.title: Skills
skills.subTitle: Please specify your skills, you can change them later in your profile at any time.

search.title: Search For Resources
search.noResults: No results. Try other search criteria or stop by later
search.error: An error occurred, please try it again later.

skills.rnaExperience_isolation: Work with RNA (esp. isolation with kit)

aboutUs.ourStoryText: LabHive comprises an interdisciplinary team of scientists, software developers and data protection experts. The idea for the platform originally emerged from two projects of the #WirVsVirus Hackathon of the German government. Both teams have volunteered their efforts to this initiative, and they have joined forces to build a strong diagnostic network.
aboutUs.title: Our Team

updateAvailability.update_notice: You can change the status when you are logged in in your profile settings.
updateAvailability.title: Update Availability

formValidation.invalid_phone: Please use the format +4992 or 123 without - or /
formValidation.invalid_url: URL must be shorter than 200 characters.
formValidation.invalid_location: Unfortunately we could not verify your address. Please check the address and make sure the spelling is correct.

backend.tokenTooOld: Please reset your password again, the reset link expired.
backend.contact_support: An error has occurred. Please contact support@labhive.de. We apologize for the inconvenience!
backend.user_not_activated: The user hasn't been activated yet. Please validate the e-mail address. If you registered as laboratory, you will be manually verified by us. When that has been done, you will receive an e-mail from us. If this takes longer than two working days, please contact us at support@labhive.de.
backend.user_disabled: Your account was deactivated. In case of questions, please contact support@labhive.de.
backend.featureNotAvailableForRole: This feature is not available for your user role.

layout.staging: Only for test purposes, does not contain real data. Live Version at https://labhive.de
